content: Hi all, I wasn't sure if I should open a JIRA issue for this... https://github.com/HL7/FHIRPath/pull/11/files (it's a small spelling fix in the spec)... Please advise. thank you, Paul
I would open a JIRA ticket, even for a typo.
For normative content, this is indeed the expectation.

Even if non-normative, if you aren't a committer, submitting a Jira is the best way to get something fixed. If it's normative, there's an expectation that a Jira will be logged even if you are a committer.
for continuity of the conversation, here is the JIRA https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-32113 (thank you all )
